results.title: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus in Patients With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome
results.text_hl: These findings provide @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@-sensitizing drugs as a unique method in treating @DISEASE_Ovarian_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D010049 @@@ovarian hyperandrogenism@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Menstruation_Disturbances</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008599 @@@irregular ovulation@@@ in @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ and indicate a new prescription for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Agrawal A 4th, Dave A, Jaiswal A. Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus in Patients With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome Cureus. 2023 Oct;15(10):e46859. PMID: 37954695

results.title: Glycogen Storage Disease Type I
results.text_hl: Management of @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovaries@@@ and/or @<m>DISEASE_Menstruation_Disturbances</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008599 @@@irregular menstrual cycles@@@ per gynecologist.

results.title: Is Metformin the Answer for Distressed Females with Menstrual Irregularities?
results.text_hl: Is @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ the Answer for Distressed Females with @<m>DISEASE_Menstruation_Disturbances</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008599 @@@Menstrual Irregularities@@@?

results.title: Role of metformin in correcting hyperinsulinemia, menstrual irregularity and anovulation in polycystic ovary syndrome.
results.text_hl: Role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in correcting @DISEASE_Hyperinsulinism @DISEASE_MESH:D006946 @@@hyperinsulinemia@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Menstruation_Disturbances</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008599 @@@menstrual irregularity@@@ and @DISEASE_Anovulation @DISEASE_MESH:D000858 @@@anovulation@@@ in @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovary syndrome@@@.

results.title: Clinical diagnosis of polycystic ovarian syndrome and response to metformin therapy.
results.text_hl: Ultrasound evidence of @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovaries@@@ was seen in 93% of @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@. After 6 months of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy, 80% @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ had achieved correction in their @<m>DISEASE_Menstruation_Disturbances</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008599 @@@menstrual irregularity@@@.

citations.NLM: Tariq N, Ayub R, Alam AY, Rahim F, Raees SR. Clinical diagnosis of polycystic ovarian syndrome and response to metformin therapy. J Coll Physicians Surg Pak. 2007 Aug;17(8):469-72. PMID: 17785124
citations.BibTeX: @article{17785124, title={Clinical diagnosis of polycystic ovarian syndrome and response to metformin therapy.}, author={Tariq N and Ayub R and Alam AY and Rahim F and Raees SR}, journal={J Coll Physicians Surg Pak}, volume={17}, number={8}, pages={469-72}}

results.title: Effects of Metformin on Symptoms of Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome Among Women of Reproductive Age
results.text_hl: Though, after the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, 69% of the study respondents indicated relief from the complaints of @<m>DISEASE_Menstruation_Disturbances</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008599 @@@menstrual cycle irregularity@@@.

citations.NLM: Artani M, Iftikhar MF, Khan S. Effects of Metformin on Symptoms of Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome Among Women of Reproductive Age Cureus. 2018 Aug 25;10(8):e3203. PMID: 30410828

results.title: Cabergoline plus metformin therapy effects on menstrual irregularity and androgen system in polycystic ovary syndrome women with hyperprolactinemia
results.text_hl: Also kedikvo et al reported that @<m>DISEASE_Menstruation_Disturbances</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008599 @@@menstrual irregularity@@@ was improved by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy (850 mg twice a day) in @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, which in contrast to our results, the dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and duration of treatment were more.

citations.NLM: Ghaneei A, Jowkar A, Hasani Ghavam MR, Ghaneei ME. Cabergoline plus metformin therapy effects on menstrual irregularity and androgen system in polycystic ovary syndrome women with hyperprolactinemia Iran J Reprod Med. 2015 Feb;13(2):93-100. PMID: 25999998
citations.BibTeX: @article{25999998, title={Cabergoline plus metformin therapy effects on menstrual irregularity and androgen system in polycystic ovary syndrome women with hyperprolactinemia}, author={Ghaneei A and Jowkar A and Hasani Ghavam MR and Ghaneei ME}, journal={Iran J Reprod Med}, volume={13}, number={2}, pages={93-100}}

results.title: Effects of metformin on clinical and biochemical parameters in polycystic ovary syndrome.
results.text_hl: Baseline characteristics (menstrual history, @DISEASE_Hirsutism @DISEASE_MESH:D006628 @@@hirsutism@@@ scoring, @DISEASE_Acne_Vulgaris @DISEASE_MESH:D000152 @@@acne@@@ grading, body mass index [BMI], serum luteinizing hormone and follicule-stimulating hormone [LH/FSH] ratio, @CHEMICAL_Testosterone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013739 @@@testosterone@@@,fasting @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@/@GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ index) were assessed initially and 6 months after @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy. Three groups were constructed on the basis of menstrual symptoms: @DISEASE_Oligomenorrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D009839 @@@oligomenorrhea@@@ (group I), @DISEASE_Amenorrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D000568 @@@amenorrhea@@@ (group II) and @<m>DISEASE_Menstruation_Disturbances</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008599 @@@hypomenorrhea@@@ (group III).

citations.NLM: Kriplani A, Agarwal N. Effects of metformin on clinical and biochemical parameters in polycystic ovary syndrome. J Reprod Med. 2004 May;49(5):361-7. PMID: 15214709
citations.BibTeX: @article{15214709, title={Effects of metformin on clinical and biochemical parameters in polycystic ovary syndrome.}, author={Kriplani A and Agarwal N}, journal={J Reprod Med}, volume={49}, number={5}, pages={361-7}}
